meanings.definition: To introduce an acetyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: Scientists acetylate the molecule to change its properties.
meanings.sent2: She acetylates the substance to make it more stable.
meanings.sent3: The chemist decided to acetylate the solution for an interesting experiment.
meanings.sent4: The process of acetylating the material was like adding a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: Acetylating the compound made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with acetic acid or an acetyl derivative.
meanings.sent1: They acetylate the fabric to give it a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: He acetylates the food to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was to acetylate the sauce.
meanings.sent4: Acetylating the ingredients together created a magical taste.
meanings.sent5: The process of acetylating the mixture was like a culinary masterpiece.
